content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (28, 28), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母は左上(3,3)近傍。こちらは(28,28)右下。まずは安全距離を保ちつつ索敵を早期開始。航続距離22なので、空母位置(28,28)中心で左上方向へ二方向うち分け扇形索敵する。BSQ1は(16,16)方面、BSQ2は(10,10)方面に指向し、途中で敵空母を視認できれば攻撃へ移行。空母本体は現状安全圏のため静止し、敵の反撃兆候を観測。次ターン以降、敵の発見状況に応じてキャリアを一歩だけ北西へ寄せる計画。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 16, "y": 16}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (16, 16) while at (27, 27).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (28, 28), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (27, 27), outbound toward (16, 16), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母は(3,3)近傍。BSQ1は(16,16)へ向け索敵中。扇形索敵を形成するため、BSQ2を左上のやや外側(10,10)へ発艦。空母は位置秘匿のため据え置き、敵機動の兆候を待つ。BSQ1/2の往路視認で敵空母を掴めれば即攻撃移行を期待。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 10, "y": 10}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. x=10 y=10 is out of squadron range. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=14 y=12.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "BSQ2の目標(10,10)は空母(28,28)からの距離が22を超えていたため却下。外周扇形を維持しつつ有効範囲内で左上寄りへ再指定する。例示の(14,12)は有効で、BSQ1(16,16)との間で広い扇を形成し早期発見を狙う。空母は秘匿のため据え置き。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 14, "y": 12}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward position (14, 12) while at (27, 27).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (28, 28), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (25, 23), outbound toward (16, 16), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (27, 27), outbound toward (14, 12), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1/2は左上へ扇形索敵中。敵初期は(3,3)近傍。航続の余裕と次ターン以降の探索拡大のため、空母を北西へ2ヘクス移動し発艦範囲を前進させる。一方で現時点で敵の所在情報なし。次ターン、必要なら第2波の再武装までに更に1ヘクス前進を検討。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 26, "y": 26}, "launch_target": null}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: Carrier target was rejected. x=26 y=26 is not on sea. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=25 y=24.
Please fix your order.
{"thinking": "キャリアの移動先(26,26)は陸で無効。前進して発艦範囲を広げる意図は維持しつつ、有効な海マスに修正して北西へ前進する。航空隊は既に索敵中のため追加指示なし。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 25, "y": 24}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (26, 29), en route to target (25, 24), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (22, 21), outbound toward (16, 16), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (25, 23), outbound toward (14, 12), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1は(16,16)へ、BSQ2は(14,12)へ向け索敵中。敵は左上域想定。第2波の発艦範囲を確保するためキャリアは北西へ継続前進。ただし陸地帯が多いので海マスを選んで移動。次ターン以降、BSQの報告に応じてさらに前進か回避を判断。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 25, "y": 24}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 5 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (25, 28), en route to target (25, 24), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (19, 19), outbound toward (16, 16), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (23, 19), outbound toward (14, 12), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "索敵継続中。BSQ1は(16,16)接近、BSQ2は(14,12)接近で北西域の広範囲をカバー。第2波や追撃のため、空母は計画どおり北西の海域へ前進して発艦範囲を拡大。ただし陸帯を避ける。現状、敵接触報なしのため追加発艦指示は不要。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 25, "y": 24}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 6 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (14, 19) while at (17, 16).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (13, 13) while at (17, 16).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (14, 19) (previously at (14, 18)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (13, 13) (previously at (13, 13)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (23, 27), en route to target (25, 24), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (17, 16), outbound toward (16, 16), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (20, 17), outbound toward (14, 12), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵機ASQ1(14,19)とASQ2(13,13)を視認。敵空母は左上域で概ね東進・南下させた偵察軸から(8〜15,10〜20)付近に存在する可能性大。こちら空母は(23,27)で北西に前進中だが、敵機往路接触＝こちら空母位置特定リスクあり。空母はさらに北西へ進めて第2波射程を伸ばしつつも陸帯回避。第2波は敵出現ラインの北側を薙ぎ、(12,16)〜(10,10)帯を再探索・攻撃狙い。現行のBSQ1/2は往路で敵空母を掴めれば即攻撃に移るためそのまま。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 21, "y": 25}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 7 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (17, 20) while at (18, 15).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (17, 21) while at (16, 16).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (16, 15) while at (16, 16).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (16, 15) while at (17, 15).
- your squadron(BSQ1) is returning to the carrier while at (16, 16).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (17, 21) (previously at (14, 18)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (16, 15) (previously at (13, 13)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (22, 26), en route to target (21, 25), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (16, 16), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (17, 15), outbound toward (14, 12), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵機ASQ1(17,21)・ASQ2(16,15)を複数回視認。敵空母はそれらの帰還方向から(10〜15,10〜18)に存在する可能性が高い。こちらは未発見を維持しつつ発艦範囲を前に出すため北西へ継続前進。BSQ1は帰還中、BSQ2は(14,12)到達後に帰還見込み。次波は(12,16)〜(10,12)帯へ再索敵・攻撃狙い。敵機往路観測が北西→南東方向であるため、次ターンも空母は陸帯を避けつつ西北西へ寄せる。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 21, "y": 25}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 8 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (19, 16) while at (15, 13).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (18, 21) while at (18, 20).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (19, 17) while at (18, 20).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (18, 21) (previously at (14, 18)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (19, 17) (previously at (13, 13)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (21, 25), en route to target (21, 25), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (18, 20), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (14, 13), outbound toward (14, 12), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵機ASQ1(18,21)・ASQ2(19,17)を継続捕捉。両機の位置から敵空母は(10〜16,12〜20)のどこかと推定。こちら空母は(21,25)で安全圏。第2波を即時投入して敵空母捜索と同時に攻撃機会を狙う。BSQ1は帰還中で次波用に早期着艦、BSQ2は(14,12)到達後帰還予定だが、敵空母が南東寄りにいる場合、(13,16)付近の扇面で捉えられる可能性が高い。よって新規発艦は(13,16)に指向して扇形の中心を埋める。空母は現位置維持で被発見リスクを抑える。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 13, "y": 16}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. Currently, all air squadrons are deployed on missions, and there are no squadrons aboard the carrier. Orders cannot be issued to squadrons that are already deployed.
Please fix your order.
{"thinking": "全航空隊は行動中で新規発艦不可。敵機は(18,21)(19,17)付近に散在、敵空母は(10〜16,12〜20)推定。こちら空母の秘匿を維持しつつ次波の発艦範囲を保つため現位置待機。BSQ1/2の復路報告方向から敵空母位置をさらに絞る。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 9 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (20, 17) while at (20, 22).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (21, 24) while at (21, 25).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (21, 24) while at (20, 23).
- your squadron(BSQ2) is returning to the carrier while at (14, 12).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (21, 24) (previously at (14, 18)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (20, 17) (previously at (13, 13)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (21, 25), en route to target (21, 25), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (20, 23), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (14, 12), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵ASQ1を(21,24)で至近視認。こちら空母(21,25)が敵に捉えられている可能性が高い。被追尾や波状攻撃を避けるため空母は即座に退避し、敵機の帰還方向＝南西〜西方向を観測して敵空母のおおよそ(12〜16,14〜18)を想定。まずは北西へ下がって接触を切り、両隊の着艦を急ぐ。着艦後は前方扇形に再発艦して敵空母推定域へ刺す。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 19, "y": 23}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 10 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) initiated an attack on an enemy squadron(ASQ1) while at (21, 25).
- your carrier(BC1) hit an enemy squadron(ASQ1) causing 29 damage while at (21, 25).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (21, 24) while at (20, 25).
- your squadron(BSQ1) landed on the carrier while at (21, 25).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (18, 13) while at (16, 16).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (21, 24) (previously at (14, 18)), HP 24/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (18, 13) (previously at (13, 13)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (21, 25), en route to target (19, 23), HP 71/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (16, 16), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵ASQ1を至近で迎撃し撃破寸前だが、こちらも被弾でHP71。敵機の位置から敵空母は(12〜16,14〜18)周辺が有力。いま敵に位置を掴まれている可能性が高いので空母は退避継続し接触を切る。同時にBSQ1を敵空母推定域の中心線(14,16)へ即時発艦し、往路で発見→攻撃を狙う。BSQ2は帰還中で合流後に第2射を準備。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 19, "y": 23}, "launch_target": {"x": 14, "y": 16}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 11 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (18, 12) while at (16, 17).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (19, 20) while at (20, 23).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (19, 20) while at (18, 20).
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (14, 16) while at (20, 22).  The distance is 9. But unless the enemy carrier is right there, that's too close for reconnaissance. Should point further away.

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (19, 20) (previously at (14, 18)), HP 24/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (18, 12) (previously at (13, 13)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (20, 23), en route to target (19, 23), HP 71/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (20, 22), outbound toward (14, 16), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (18, 20), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵機ASQ1(19,20)とASQ2(18,12)を視認。敵空母はそれらの帰還方向から(12〜16,14〜18)周辺が引き続き有力。こちらは退避しつつ、BSQ1の索敵半径をもう少し先に伸ばしたいが既に出撃中のため目標変更不可。空母をさらに南西へズラし敵の追撃線から外れ、次波(BSQ2着艦後)の発艦扇面を広げる。BSQ1の往路で敵空母を掴める可能性はまだ高い。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 18, "y": 21}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 12 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (18, 18) while at (20, 22).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (18, 18) while at (19, 22).
- your squadron(BSQ2) landed on the carrier while at (20, 22).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (17, 16) while at (17, 19).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (17, 16) (previously at (14, 18)), HP 24/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (18, 12) (previously at (13, 13)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (20, 22), en route to target (18, 21), HP 71/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (17, 19), outbound toward (14, 16), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵ASQ1が(17,16)へ南下。敵空母は(12〜16,14〜18)帯の可能性がさらに高い。BSQ1は(14,16)指向中で良い扇面。今が第二波の好機。BSQ2を敵空母推定域のやや奥側へ指向し、往路で発見→即攻撃を狙う。空母は退避を続けつつ西南側へズラして被発見・追撃リスクを下げる。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 18, "y": 21}, "launch_target": {"x": 12, "y": 16}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 13 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (15, 12) while at (15, 16).
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward position (12, 16) while at (18, 20).  The distance is 8. But unless the enemy carrier is right there, that's too close for reconnaissance. Should point further away.

- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (15, 12) (previously at (14, 18)), HP 24/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (18, 12) (previously at (13, 13)), HP 40/40.

- Your squadron BSQ1: position (15, 16), outbound toward (14, 16), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (18, 20), outbound toward (12, 16), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵ASQ1が(15,12)まで南下。敵空母は依然として(12〜15,14〜17)帯が有力だが、より北西(10〜14,12〜16)も考慮。BSQ1/2は既に往路で目標変更不可のため、このまま扇形で貫通させて発見・攻撃を狙う。こちら空母は敵機群接近リスクを下げつつ、次の再発艦の展開性を確保するため西南へ1ステップ退避して被発見線から外す。着艦後の再攻撃に備える。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 16, "y": 19}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 14 of 30.

- Your squadron BSQ2: position (15, 18), outbound toward (12, 16), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵ASQ1は(13,11)まで南下。敵空母は(10〜14,12〜16)周辺が引き続き有力。BSQ1は帰還、BSQ2は(12,16)方面へ往路継続でそのまま発見・攻撃を狙う。空母は被発見リスクを下げつつ次波の発艦扇面を維持するため南西へ退避継続。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 16, "y": 19}, "launch_target": null}}

- Your squadron BSQ2: position (12, 16), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母は(10〜14,12〜16)付近が最有力。BSQ2は(12,16)から帰還中で敵空母位置の西側〜北側が濃厚。先手で決定打を狙うため、BSQ1をさらに奥の(10,14)へ指向して往路で捕捉→攻撃を狙う。空母は現位置維持で発艦範囲を確保しつつ被発見リスクを抑える。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 10, "y": 14}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 16 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (10, 14) while at (16, 18).  The distance is 8. But unless the enemy carrier is right there, that's too close for reconnaissance. Should point further away.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (16, 19), en route to target (16, 19), HP 71/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (16, 18), outbound toward (10, 14), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (15, 18), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母はこれまでの敵機動から(10〜14,12〜16)周辺が最有力。BSQ1は(10,14)へ往路中で目標変更不可。BSQ2は帰還中で着艦後の再発艦でさらに奥を刺したい。空母は現位置で待機し、次ターンBSQ2を(8,12)〜(9,13)といった奥目へ出して包囲索敵を完成させる。被発見リスクを抑えるため本ターンは動かない。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.
